about-description-1: I'm passionate about creating useful applications. Whether as a Developer or a Project Manager. I love TEAM work, because when we are united we can easily ship products.
about-description-2: Currently studing at Wrocław University of Technology at the Bachelor's program of Systems Engineering.
about-description-3: Besides IT I love fantasy books and computer games. Especially grand strategy; and RPG's from the polish game studio CD Projekt Red.
wmsdev-description-1: Active programmer, Project Manager and co-president of the WMS_DEV scientific club at Wrocław University of Technology.
wmsdev-description-2: We create web applications for the student community, all based on Scrum and market-leading technologies.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description: Professional farmers calculate the profitability of crops, considering all revenues and costs. This calculator makes the process intuitive. Created for topagrar.pl.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-click: Click below to try the app or explore the code.
wms-dev-description: Homepage of the CS Scientific Circle WMS_DEV at my university — Wrocław University of Science and Technology. This is a team project, where I serve as both Project Manager and Frontend Developer.
wms-dev-click: Check out the code created by the team of epic developers from WMS_DEV.
porownywarka-odmian-description: The economic success of crop production depends on choosing the right variety. This tool helps interpret large goverment databases (source: COBORU). It makes sorting and comparing data much easier than in Excel.
porownywarka-odmian-click: Click below to see the app in action or explore the code.
kalkulator-rozpylaczy-description: Plant protection treatments require selecting the correct pressure, speed, and liquid dose. The result is a specific spray tip (a replaceable machine part identified by number and color). This tool helps you choose the right spray tip and set the operating parameters.
kalkulator-rozpylaczy-click: Click below to see the tool in action or explore the code.
arvalis-description: A technology demonstrator for the Arvalis Institute. Built using a table from www.arvalis.fr. It allows quick estimation of wheat lodging risk based on soil, variety, nitrogen fertilization, and biomass at the end of tillering stage.
arvalis-click: Click below to see the tool in action or explore the code.
